channel.title: Cant run client (It cant find "main class")
channel.description:
When i try to run my client i get this error?
Exception in thread "main" java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source) at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method) at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source) Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit. Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .
My friend can run the client just fine though. Can anyone ehlp me fix this?

item.title: Cant run client (It cant find "main class")

item.description:
@samriek wrote:

ooh thx it was not running in the rigfht directory

item.title: Cant run client (It cant find "main class")
item.dc:creator: @samriek samriek
item.description:
@samriek wrote:

When i try to run my client i get this error?

Exception in thread “main” java.lang.NoClassDefFoundError: client
Caused by: java.lang.ClassNotFoundException: client
at java.net.URLClassLoader$1.run(Unknown Source)
at java.security.AccessController.doPrivileged(Native Method)
at java.net.URLClassLoader.findClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at sun.misc.Launcher$AppClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
at java.lang.ClassLoader.loadClass(Unknown Source)
Could not find the main class: client. Program will exit.
Druk op een toets om door te gaan. . .

My friend can run the client just fine though. Can anyone ehlp me fix this?
